reviews.review: A fantastic film. Amazed stunned and in awe

This movie does a good job of driving its themes home, complimented with countless moments of pulse-pounding action, uproarious laughter, and crushing heartbreak. The visuals, score, and performances amount to a much more satisfying experience than any comic book crossover has managed to deliver.
Great movie, with great action scenes. A powerful conclusion to an epic and  audacious saga.
Lame. Who makes a movie like that? Cheap trick from the studios. Donâ€™t get me wrong. There were a lot of great moments in the movie but the last 20 minutes ruined it and just ticked me off.
An edgy and edge of seat movie

This is the first time I have not only disliked a Marvel Movie but hated it! The plot was over crowded so it was realitivly hard to get invested. The deaths were so frequent and meaningless because of sequels that they did not hit home at all, most of them had me rolling my eyes saying "well that's not going to stick". I understand this is part 1 but with part 2 so far out this movie needs to stand on its own, and in my opinion it doesn't. 

A big part of the reason I go to superhero movies is the happy ending. I love it when the good guy wins despite the deck being stacked against him, however lately there seems to be this push to make hero movies darker and more hopeless. That is not the hero movie I want to see. This movie seemed to be a gut punch of tragedy for tragedies sake. 

I love the MCU and this was disappointing for me. Hopefully the next movie makes me love it again.
Absolutely fantastic! 10 years later and I'm blown away by the amount of energy they crammed into 2 hours and 30 some odd min! I wasn't bored the entire movie and will definitely see it 2 more times!
One of the strangest endings ever
(STORM) NEW FAV IN THE MCU IF THERE WERE ANY MORE STARS LEFT IT WOULD GO ON AND ON AND ON PLZ WATCH THIS AMAZING MOVIE SLAP YOURSELF IF U DONT LIKE THIS FILM

definitely 1 of the best. tho it did lack alot for the true die-hards. it is long too. but, alot of stuff going on. and I don't know what the hell they were trying to do with the Hulk? Thanos was the Star.
